    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:75c8c7b6-7fc7-46cd-ae29-367907ce1786</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>75c8c7b6-7fc7-46cd-ae29-367907ce1786</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az első szint galériája</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Gallery Of The First Level</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Galerie Der Ersten Stufe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Galerie du Premier Niveau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Galeria Do Primeiro Nível</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Galleria Del Primo Livello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η στοά του πρώτου επιπέδου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Galería Del Primer Nivel</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az adott szint összes leckéjéhez kapcsolódó - interaktív - mikrovilágok</string>
            <string language="en-US">Interactive micro-worlds related to every lesson of the given level.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Imagine Logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">turtle graphics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Logo programming</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Mikro-Welten in Verbindung gestanden 
auf jeder Lektion der gegebenen Stufe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les micro-mondes interactifs ont associé à chaque
leçon du niveau donné.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os micro-mundos interativos relacionaram-se a cada 
lição do nível dado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I micro-mondi interattivi si sono riferiti ad ogni 
lezione di dato livello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικοί μικροϋπολογιστής-κόσμοι σχετικοί με κάθε 
μάθημα του δεδομένου επιπέδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los micro-mundos interactivos se relacionaron con 
cada lección del nivel dado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie Sich Firmenzeichen Vor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schildkrötegraphiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Firmenzeichenprogrammierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Imaginez Le Logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphiques de tortue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmation de logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagine O Logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráficos da tartaruga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programação do logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini Il Marchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grafici della tartaruga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmazione di marchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φανταστείτε το λογότυπο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραφική παράσταση χελωνών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγραμματισμός λογότυπων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imagine La Insignia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gráficos de la tortuga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Programación de la insignia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
